compounddef.briefdescription: Methods and properties added to the global JavaScript object.

memberdef.name: options
memberdef.detaileddescription: Global property to all configuration values of KWin core.

memberdef.name: workspace
memberdef.detaileddescription: Global property to the core wrapper of KWin.

memberdef.name: print
memberdef.detaileddescription: Prints all provided values to kDebug and as a D-Bus signal

memberdef.name: readConfig
memberdef.detaileddescription: Reads the config value for key in the Script's configuration with the optional default value. If not providing a default value and no value stored in the configuration an undefined value is returned.

memberdef.name: registerScreenEdge
memberdef.detaileddescription: Registers the callback for the screen edge. When the mouse gets pushed against the given edge the callback will be invoked.

memberdef.argsstring: (QString title, QString text, QString keySequence, QScriptValue callback)
memberdef.name: registerShortcut
memberdef.detaileddescription: Registers keySequence as a global shortcut. When the shortcut is invoked the callback will be called. Title and text are used to name the shortcut and make it available to the global shortcut configuration module.

memberdef.name: assert
memberdef.detaileddescription: Aborts the execution of the script if value does not evaluate to true. If message is provided an error is thrown with the given message, if not provided an error with default message is thrown.

memberdef.name: assertTrue
memberdef.detaileddescription: Aborts the execution of the script if value does not evaluate to true. If message is provided an error is thrown with the given message, if not provided an error with default message is thrown.

memberdef.name: assertFalse
memberdef.detaileddescription: Aborts the execution of the script if value does not evaluate to false. If message is provided an error is thrown with the given message, if not provided an error with default message is thrown.

memberdef.argsstring: (QVariant expected, QVariant actual, QString message = QString())
memberdef.name: assertEquals
memberdef.detaileddescription: Aborts the execution of the script if the actual value is not equal to the expected value. If message is provided an error is thrown with the given message, if not provided an error with default message is thrown.

memberdef.name: assertNull
memberdef.detaileddescription: Aborts the execution of the script if value is not null. If message is provided an error is thrown with the given message, if not provided an error with default message is thrown.

memberdef.name: assertNotNull
memberdef.detaileddescription: Aborts the execution of the script if value is null. If message is provided an error is thrown with the given message, if not provided an error with default message is thrown.

memberdef.argsstring: (QString service, QString path, QString interface, QString method, QVariant arg..., QScriptValue callback = QScriptValue())
memberdef.name: callDBus
memberdef.detaileddescription: Call a D-Bus method at (service, path, interface and method). A variable number of arguments can be added to the method call. The D-Bus call is always performed in an async way invoking the callback provided as the last (optional) argument. The reply values of the D-Bus method call are passed to the callback.
